name: research-improvements
description: Research latest improvements without implementing them

trigger.description: Research latest development trends and improvement opportunities

workflow.name: Research Only Workflow
workflow.description: Discover improvements and trends without making any system changes

agents.task: Research latest development trends, tools, and patterns that could improve our agent system
agents.purpose: Identify improvement opportunities and industry changes
agents.expected_output: Research findings and recommendations for future consideration

note: This workflow only researches and reports - no changes are made to the system
